values: 刺入，刺穿，穿透；（以目光、洞察力等）看透，识破
To pierce something means to make a hole in it using a sharp object.
The arrow pierced the target in the very center.
vt. 刺穿；洞察；响彻；深深地打动 vi. 进入；透入
